description: As the night draws to a close, Ricky needs one more moment of release. He sets himself up on the jeep and begins stroking. Soon he's fucking himself with a big black dildo and then with an AK-47 gun. He shoots a load all over the barrel and licks the gun clean, the fulfilled conclusion to another day at boot camp. Sergeants have it good......
title: Grunts The New Recruits, Scene #07
